name: Let Them Eat Fist
description:
Let Them Eat Fist was made for The Game Assembly's NGC JAM 2022 over a period of 2 and a half days. The game sets the player in the shoes of a princess of thier choice, fending off thristy would-be suitors with their bare hands.

Controls:

Menus: Cycle character with A/D, go back with S, confirm with Enter

In-Game: Move with WASD, Look with the mouse, Scroll or use 1/2 to swap weapons, Left Click to attack.
